short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paperhub browser extension to bookmark and save the web and sync highlights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Paperhub you can:
⭐️ Import and manage your reading highlights
🔖 Bookmark the web, create & share folders
📖 Read your saved articles without distractions
🔄 Sync data with the apps you love

Extension features:
• Import your Amazon Kindle highlights to Paperhub
• Bookmark any page on the web and send it to Paperhub
